definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: Of course, these are digital distributors talking here.
sentences.chinese: 当然，这仅仅是数字漫画分销商的一面之词。

sentences.english: The printers and distributors of the magazine had their windows smashed.
sentences.chinese: 杂志印刷商和分销商家的窗户都被人砸破了。

sentences.english: Normally, the Reseller has enough widgets in inventory to fulfill the customer order.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，分销商的库存能够满足客户的订购需求。

sentences.english: TVI's growing team of Independent Distributors is the key to its success.
sentences.chinese: 积分日益增长的团队独立分销商是其成功的关键所在。

sentences.english: Deletes the incoming purchase order sent by the Reseller.
sentences.chinese: 删除分销商发送来的购买订单。

sentences.english: Manufacturer and distributor of aftermarket spare parts for earthmoving machines.
sentences.chinese: 运土搬运机械零件市场零部件制造商和分销商。

sentences.english: Arrow Asia Pac is one of Asia-Pacific's leading electronic component distributors.
sentences.chinese: 艾睿电子是亚太地区领先的元器件分销商之一。

sentences.english: Quick response ability(QRA) is the core competence 0f distributors in the supply chain.
sentences.chinese: 快速反应能力是供应链中分销商的核心能力。

sentences.english: Under what circumstances can the distributor return merchandise to the manufacturer?
sentences.chinese: 在什么情况下分销商能将商品返还给制造商？

sentences.english: What are the distributor’s rights to inspect and test?
sentences.chinese: 分销商验货和测试的权利怎样？

definition: to sell/to sell on commission/to distribute
